projects.name: 9th Annual Trading Competition
projects.description: Learned to trade financial securities on a real-time basis using Rotman Interactive Trader Software. Quickly applied the knowledge in a fast-paced, simulated trade floor. Placed second in the category of Trading.

projects.name: World Cup Data League Challenge
projects.description: Applied knowledge from workshops on sports data analysis and APIs. Visualized the data using Power BI and placed fourth in the Overall Competition.

projects.name: Datathon
projects.description: Analyzed usage data of 108 old batteries to predict the remaining usage life for 19 unknown batteries using their usage data.

projects.name: Marketplace Application
projects.description: Developed an app allowing store owners and customers to interact and place orders for pickup.

projects.name: Fake:It
projects.description: An AI that analyzes facial expressions and speech through webcams and microphones, tailoring responses to emotions for personalized, confidence-boosting conversations.

projects.name: Dispose It Right
projects.description: A mobile application developed in React Native that detects trash and uses AI to determine how to dispose of it in simple steps.

projects.name: Predictive Modelling
projects.description: Conducted intense data analysis on traffic signs, celestial labeling, and heart disease datasets. Achieved 6th place out of over 20+ teams.

projects.name: Safe Haven
projects.description: Developed a mobile application for Crohn's and colitis patients needing urgent bathroom access. Provides helpful information and navigation.
